title: MentorMe Data Schema v1
description: Schema for MentorMe app data export/storage format version 1. Use this to validate backup files from older app versions. IMPORTANT: When modifying schemas, ensure corresponding Dart models are updated. See lib/services/backup_service.dart for export format implementation. See CLAUDE.md 'Data Schema Management' section for full synchronization checklist.

schemaVersion.description: Data schema version - must be 1 for this schema

exportDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when backup was created

appVersion.description: App version that created this backup

pulse_types.description: JSON-encoded array of pulse type definitions

chat_conversations.description: JSON-encoded array of AI chat conversations

mentor_messages.description: JSON-encoded array of mentor coaching messages

custom_templates.description: JSON-encoded array of custom journal templates

sessions.description: JSON-encoded array of structured journaling sessions

enabled_templates.description: JSON-encoded array of enabled template IDs

journalEntry_v1.description: Structure of a journal entry in v1 (before structured journal content migration). Dart Model: lib/models/journal_entry.dart. Export: lib/services/backup_service.dart (journal_entries field).

content.description: For quickNote, this is required. For structuredJournal in v1, this may be null.

structuredData.description: For structuredJournal entries, contains the form data
